entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • keep total_committed_so_far and total_decommitted_so_far counters #73417
    7.0.0
  • Induced aggressive GC needs to be added to trace event. #73415
    7.0.0
  • SIP region alloc isn't accounted for in any ETW events #73414
    7.0.0
  • Consider putting the AllocTick event on a different keyword so we can get the join events #73413
    7.0.0
  • Should add Working Set accounting in our tooling #73412
  • Fixing ETW event emission from revisit_written_pages #73411
    7.0.0
  • placement new does not return properly aligned instance #73409
  • Clean up and fix management of ExplicitThis in the CoreCLR native runtime #73407
    8.0.0
  • datacontractserializertests.dcs_mypersonsurrogate_stress fails in CI #73405
  • Crossgen2 determinism issue found in Roslyn #73403
    7.0.0
  • const attribute of an instance of host_interface is ignored #73402
    7.0.0
  • CI build: Slow macs causing random legs to timeout #73401
  • Illegal runtime behavior in C++ code taking reference to null pointer #73392
    8.0.0
  • TaskExtensions.Unwrap threads going missing. #73390
  • Provide a way to disable using subtle crypto on WebAssembly for the .NET crypto APIs #73386
  • System.Text.Json contract customization ignoring custom `CreateObject` delegates in certain collection types #73382
    8.0.0
  • "CTRL+M" is captured as "Enter" in console app on Linux #73379
  • [QUIC] Long running test: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73377
    7.0.0
  • STJ source generation fails when class contains a property of type JsonSerializerOptions #73371
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #73388
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Gzip #73389
  • High CPU usage in docker when service is not doing anything #73361
  • client.PostAsJsonAsync 方法出现了错误 #73360
  • Platform compatibilty analyzer doesn't treat "windows" as "windows7.0" by default #73358
    7.0.0
  • Platform compatibility analyzer doesn't recognize operating system checks that return or throw #73357
  • [NativeAot] System.Reflection.Context.Tests.CustomReflectionContextTests.MapType_MemberAttributes_Success #73356
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' #73355
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 platform compatibility analyzer warns const string is only callable in certain OS platform #73354
  • Code analyzer should issue a warning when variable name at wrong place in ArgumentException and ArgumentOutOfRangeException constructor call #73352
  • superpmi: x86 asm diffs using `-target_arch` have relocatable constant differences #73349
    8.0.0
  • system.net.security.tests.negotiateauthenticationkerberostest.loopback_success #73343
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Crossgen2: System.BadImageFormatException: Read out of bounds #60343
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IBinaryInteger<TSelf> read methods #71902
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\ValueNumbering\\TypeTestFolding\\TypeTestFolding.cmd #72822
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: File name: 'Azure.Core, Version=1.19.0.0 #63396
    7.0.0
  • timeout in ZeroByteRead_IssuesZeroByteReadOnUnderlyingStream #67509
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/fileversionpreservation/fileversionpreservation/fileversionpreservation.sh #72823
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer throw an InvalidCastException when serializing an array of item with a custom converter #46522
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ReadJson<Hashtable> #66341
    7.0.0
  • Old account #73313
  • System.Drawing.Tests failing on Windows 10 Arm64 with OS apparently doubling DPI of bitmaps/icons #67320
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Drawing.Tests.IconTests.Save_OutputStream_Success(fileName: \"96x96_one_entry_8bit.ico\") #60823
    7.0.0
  • Cleanup Interop in System.Drawing.Common to follow repo guidelines #49469
    7.0.0
  • It is difficult to determine whether TieredPGO and ReadyToRun are enabled #69820
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException : A generic error occurred in GDI+ #58741
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.SerializeToDocument results encapsulate buffers rented from the shared ArrayPool #73398
    8.0.0
  • System.ArgumentException : Font '?' cannot be found. on openSUSE docker #60290
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] aot build error when a delegate return struct by reference #67734
    7.0.0
  • Deprecate HttpListener #63941
    Future
  • [mono][gshared] generic instance function pointer crash #66337
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Regression: `System.Text.Json` tests failing with trimming #73347
    7.0.0
  • BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount(0) returns 32 #73376
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #70845
    7.0.0
  • change the default of cpu group to be enabled on Windows #13465
    7.0.0
  • add support for CertificateChainPolicy to Quic #72873
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Simple linear search #64455
    7.0.0
  • Assert failed: block != nullptr in system.xml.xmlserializer.reflectiononly.tests #72840
    7.0.0
  • Potential breaking change in socket close behavior in net6 over net5 on Linux #70311
    7.0.0
  • .Net SMTP client throttling outgoing mail #73353
    7.0.0
  • Crash in GetHashCode with generic record #72181
    7.0.0
  • Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR, 'A security error occurred #33509
    6.0.0
  • HttpClient.SendAsync ignores set Content-Type header in Blazor Web Assembly #72264
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][codespaces] Enable debugger's Firefox tests in Codespaces #73287
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 slower than .NET 5 for relatively simple linq #65399
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Connection timeout has QuicError.InternalError #73141
    7.0.0
  • [workloads] Keeping workload updates compatible with older runtime versions #53621
    7.0.0
  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #72904
  • [wasm] Debugger tests with chrome broken on CI #73342
    7.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 7) #55235
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!comp->opts.compJitEarlyExpandMDArrays' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #72768
    7.0.0
  • Internal Error in .NET Runtime #70341
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' #57752
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Error when multiple connections to a server #73282
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_71375\\Runtime_71375\\Runtime_71375.cmd #72759
    7.0.0
  • system.net.security.tests.negotiateauthenticationkerberostest.loopback_success #73346
  • system.net.security.tests.negotiateauthenticationkerberostest.loopback_success #73345
  • system.net.security.tests.negotiateauthenticationkerberostest.loopback_success #73344
  • mono ARM64 llvmfullaot builds are often timing out #73081
  • AddSeconds and FromSeconds rounding issues #66815
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix issue where calculation of valuetypeshapecharacteristic on Arm64 does not match native runtime #73406
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add missing const qualifier to hosting API implementation #73404
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • xplat-setup.yml: Add support for setting shouldContinueOnError to #73400
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ThreadAbort on Unix and reenable the related tests #73399
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Set up `HttpClient` for `ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync` #73387
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73384
    area-System.Memory
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #73380
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip Manual_CertificateOnlySentWhenValid_Success for WinHttpHandler #73378
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Mark phase prefetching. #73375
    area-GC-coreclr
  • PlatformNotSupportedException for UNIX domain sockets on iOS/tvOS #73374
  • Apply some obvious rich debug info optimizations #73373
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Use DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts to configure Diagnostic Server #73370
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOf(ref char, char, int) to Vector128/256 #73368
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Bring up a dozen or so libraries tests #73363
    area-Meta
  • Disambiguate calli thunks based on full calling conventions #73359
  • Refactor input bubble checks to work in non-composite scenarios #73350
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Guard Kerberos test with RemoteExecutor.IsSupported #73362
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Make Ibc support opt-in instead of enabled by default #73397
    area-Single-File
  • Expose the IBinaryInteger<T>.ReadBig/LittleEndian APIs #73274
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add initial riscv64 port #73385
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix missing case for function pointer signatures in Crossgen2 #73341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • increase timeout on ZeroByteRead_IssuesZeroByteReadOnUnderlyingStream test #73196
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT tests interopservices #73200
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fail JsonTypeInfo.CreateObject setting when not supported by converter. #73395
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix InvalidCastException when casting a polymorphic converter #73259
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix performance regression introduced in object deserialization #73369
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • run CET pipeline on a schedule. #73381
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete NGen flavor of JIT configs #73383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [docs] Debugging Libraries tests on Mono using VS Code #73393
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Disable failing tests when aggressive trimming is enabled #73372
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit struct-to-ptr and ptr-to-struct wrappers for generic… #73301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • enable Quic tests on Alpine #73317
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add support for X509ChainPolicy for QUIC #73056
    area-System.Net
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOf(ref byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73364
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Enumerable.Chunk #73134
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix types, tests and samples #73366
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] marshling call to assembly entrypoint via new interop #73156
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][codespaces] Fix debugger's Firefox tests in Codespaces #73288
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Throw exception with correct QuicError for ConnectionTimeout #73227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Disable SendMailAsync test #73340
    area-System.Net
  • Move format.py script and use retrying download #72993
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_Cancellation_Test_NonParallel.CancelPendingRequest_DropsStalledConnectionAttempt on Linux #73300
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [debugger][mono] Fix side effect of 73024 #73309
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable 4 more libraries tests #73214
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Propagate BBF_HAS_MDARRAYREF to new blocks when copying IR #73351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] deprecate legacy JS API and propose new #73068
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix path to non-Windows symbols for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host #73333
    area-Setup
  • ILASM - Fixing ILASM roundtrip issue with `vararg` calling convention #73273
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Data.Common with RequiresDynamicCode #73199
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MONO] Increased timeout for llvmfullaot lanes #73265
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enhance the date and time precision in Add methods #73198
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Process incoming frames before sending frames for Http2Connection. #73307
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable async runtime suspension and return hijacking on unix-arm64 #73216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAot] Start running 8 more libs tests #73283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Provide a code-fix to add missing stateful marshaller shape methods #73186
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Optimize DateTime.Year/.DayOfYear properties; fix comments #73277
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add AllBitsSet DIM #72961
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement thread-local caching for Utf8JsonWriter in JsonSerializer. #73338
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update global.json default and Version of dotnet used to test net7 Maui #73171
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [iOS] Reenable skipped StructureToPtr tests #73236
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations.PopCount in AOT mode. #73147
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono] Enable X86Base.Pause test only when LLVM is enabled #73318
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm-mt] Remove two-phase suspend; fix state transitions in DS server; fix merge #73305
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [wasm] asset loading for subtle crypto + logging #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Return null for localloc with len 0 #73174
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not throw ObjectDisposeException from Socket.EndXyz methods #73335
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Documenting providing websocket upgrade response #73296
    documentation, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add annotations to System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73337
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Feedback wanted: Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
  • Fix sending end stream in http2 web socket stream #73222
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Debugging Span.Reverse #73157
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/6.0] Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings #73155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data.Odbc, 6.0.9
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64CharArray and TryToBase64Chars #73320
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Improve idle timeout tests #73228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #67853 check if tvos tests are still failing #72935
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect `new` keyword in derived members on GetProperties #73230
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
